description: I had interned at ACIS Professional Center Co., Ltd as a cyber security consultant. I was responsible for analyzing and identifying vulnerabilities in the system, as well as providing solutions to prevent cyber attacks. Especially in the field of AI applications.

description: I am currently studying in the Faculty of Engineering at Chulalorngorn University, majoring in Computer Engineering and Digital Technology.
